application_assistant_subtitle: The best place to start your application for the German Chancenkarte.
question_1_text: Do you have a qualification that required at least 2 years to complete?
option_1_a: Yes, I hold a professional qualification (vocational training)
option_1_b: Yes, I have a university degree
option_1_c: Yes, I have an appropriate qualification from a German Chamber of Commerce abroad
option_1_d: No, I do not have any formal professional qualifications
